scalarPixelsToWorld(float) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes a pixel-scalar and returns the corresponding Box2D-World value.
scalarPixelsToWorld(Vec2) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes two pixel-scalars (as a Vec2 instance) and returns the corresponding Box2D-World values.
scalarWorldToPixels(float) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes a Box2D-World scalar and returns the corresponding pixel value.
scalarWorldToPixels(Vec2) - Method in class box2d.B2DCamera
Takes a Box2D-World scalar pair and returns the corresponding pixel values.
Screen - Class in display
The Screen class extends the JavaFX Canvas class contains many methods for rendering a Test environment.
Screen(double, double, float, Vec2) - Constructor for class display.Screen
Initialises a new Screen object and sets the default Canvas size and the starting values for the framing.
scrollEvent(ScrollEvent) - Method in class display.Screen
This method is called by a ScrollEvent.
scrollZoomEnabled - Variable in class display.Screen
If scrollZoomEnabled is true the user can adjust the adjust the framing by dragging and scrolling.
selectedChange(int, int) - Method in class display.PopScreen
This method is called once the mouse has entered a list element or when it left a list element.
selectedIndex - Variable in class display.PopScreen
Holds information about which list element the mouse is or was hovering

ShapeType - Enum in box2d
The ShapeType enum is used to define the type of a B2DBody.

showMuscles - Variable in class display.TestScreen
Can be set to true to display the muscles and the activity on the Screen
showMuscles(boolean) - Method in class display.TestScreen
Calling this method will enable/disable the muscles of the active Creature.
showMuscles() - Method in class display.TestScreen
Calling this method will toggle the display of muscles of the active Creature.
showScore - Variable in class display.TestScreen
Can be set to true to show a marker at the fitness distance of a Creature.
showScore(boolean) - Method in class display.TestScreen
Calling this method will enable/disable a marker which marks the distance the active Creature is able to reach in the given time.
showTimer - Variable in class display.TestScreen
Can be set to true to display the test timer on the Screen
showTimer(boolean) - Method in class display.TestScreen
Calling this method will enable/disable a timer shown in the top right corner of the TestScreen it shows the elapsed time and the total time of the current Test
singleAction() - Method in class display.PopScreenControl
This method is called, when the multi-purpose button had been pressed.
slow() - Method in class display.TestScreen
Halves the speed of the animation / physics calculations of this TestScreen instance.
squareButton(Button) - Static method in class display.Layout
Sets the CSS styling for the given Button and sets its dimensions to 32px by 32px.
start() - Method in class display.TestScreen
Starts the animation / physics calculations of this TestScreen instance.
